Text: Good To see that you are downloading :D enjoy the game :)

I have downloaded it, and it stands that you need to have the original disc?
Don´t work! Needs the original cd!

It does work indeed. just needs a bit more work.

Mount the image using Daemon Tools, and install the game. you probably get the "Needs original cd" message when you try to play it by now.

Now download Safedisc Cleaner 2 (google it), and Unwrap the .exe file in the folder where you installed the game. It will make a new icon called SDCLEANED, or something like that.

Game should work if you got it mounted in daemon tools, and click the SDCLEANED icon.

Thanks, i will seed.
